content.question: Before 1870, the European presence in Africa was characterized primarily by

choices.label: military conquests of large territories administered as military states
intense colonization and settlement of large areas
active international interaction through trade and diplomacy
coastal enclaves for trade and a few settlements
frequent coastal raids along with racial segregation imposed on conquered peoples

content.answer: coastal enclaves for trade and a few settlements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
